SCTX:
Begin spiritBearScript

short doOnce


if ( GetDisabled == 0 )
	if ( GetJournalIndex BM_BearHunt1 < 60 )
		if ( GetJournalIndex BM_BearHunt2 < 30 )
			Disable
		endif
	endif
elseif ( GetDisabled == 1 )
	if ( GetJournalIndex BM_BearHunt1 >= 60 )
		Enable
	elseif ( GetJournalIndex BM_BearHunt2 >= 30 )
		Enable
	endif
endif

if ( OnDeath == 1 )
	if ( doOnce == 0 )
		if ( GetJournalIndex BM_BearHunt1 >= 60 )
			"rolf long-tooth"->ModDisposition 30
			Journal BM_BearHunt1 75
			set doOnce to 1
		elseif ( GetJournalIndex BM_BearHunt2 >= 30 )
			Journal BM_BearHunt2 50
			set doOnce to 1
		endif
	endif
endif





End spiritBearScript
